original_text: So they inquired again of the Lord, “Is there a man still to come?” and the Lord said, “Behold, he has hidden himself among the baggage.”
korean_text: 그러므로 그들이 또 여호와께 묻되 그 사람이 여기 왔나이까 여호와께서 대답하시되 그가 짐보따리들 사이에 숨었느니라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: So they inquired again of the Lord,
“Is there a man still to come?”
he has hidden himself among the baggage.”
